name: Last Mission (Tronic Verlag)
overview: An action game created by Marc Städele and published in Compute mit 1987/11. As the hero of a spaceship, you find yourself once again in outer space, which is known to be well populated. The game is about avoiding deadly energy barriers and going on a collision course with a small spaceship in a rough showdown to get to the next level. fun and excitement is guaranteed. What more do you want?
